website_summaries.verdict: A great choice for active people who need the extra support. Excellent brand value.
pros: Incredibly flexible, offers even support, and lives up to the reputation of its maker
cons: On the more expensive side, but you are paying for the quality of materials

customer_reviews.title: but it was a great mental boost
customer_reviews.text: I wore this when my knee started giving me trouble. My knee locked even while wearing this, but it was a great mental boost, and even better for rehabilitating over time. I was able to do all the things that probably jacked my knee up in the first place with this on. I kept wearing it, and minded my knee and it eventually healed. Gave it to my father and he hasn't given it back. I wish their were more color options or that it was a bit more affordable or came with two, but I'm perfectly please with what I got.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Samuels

customer_reviews.title: The BEST orthopedic knee support
customer_reviews.text: The BEST knee support ever!!! I have 2 total knees and I brought this same brace for a thousand dollars 5 years ago at my Orthopedic office. LOVE I can purchase for far less on Amazon! I'm ordering another!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren_Morlene

customer_reviews.title: Good and Expensive
customer_reviews.text: This is a good knee brace. It's very long up the thigh for extended support and not shifting. BUT....it's not anywhere as good or supporting as the Pro Tek of the same design. AND it's double the price.....I thought a higher price would make a better brace......it just made a better Advertisement!
customer_reviews.author: RT Tunney

customer_reviews.title: Good elastic (and bulky) bandage but its not for support
customer_reviews.text: I liked this "knee support" because it fit and was breathable as claimed. However, I ordered it for the support but this rather bulky knee sock has virtually none. I imagine that an Ace elastic bandage could do the same job.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is by far the best knee brace I've ever worn
customer_reviews.text: In the past 15 years I've wore multiple different types of braces - some custom built. This is by far the best knee brace I've ever worn. In addition to helping during my basketball games, my knees feel much better after exercise.
customer_reviews.author: Car

customer_reviews.title: ... top and the bottom made it fit so much better then the others that only come with the knees ...
customer_reviews.text: What a different's it made on my knee and with being able to get the right fit by measuring at the top and the bottom made it fit so much better then the others that only come with the knees measurement.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Effective support for minor knee injuries
customer_reviews.text: Awesome custom-fit support; kind of expensive but definitely more affordable than a fully-fitted orthopedic brace.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great Knee Support
customer_reviews.text: Fits well and works the way it is supposed to. It was much better and easier to use that another brace I was using.
customer_reviews.author: Vince Herberholt

customer_reviews.title: great brace
customer_reviews.text: no roll down fits perfect. Gotta measure your leg.I had to return my size 5 for a 6 . Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Mike LI NewYork

customer_reviews.title: Good Fit
customer_reviews.text: The Bauerfeind GenuTrain Knee Support (Black, 6) was purchased for its reputation. I needed something better than the normal non-fitting and slipping from sports stores. This item (I purchased 2) fit and supported me knees without always slipping. So far I've been able to walk, play golf and basketball in less pain. These put me back on the raod to rid myself of un-needed weight. Very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Earl

customer_reviews.title: Works as others have written.
customer_reviews.text: Feels like it was made just for me. My knee feels somewhat better wearing the knee support.
customer_reviews.author: Papa Bear

customer_reviews.title: Great Knee brace
customer_reviews.text: I love the brace. I had knee surgery about 3 months ago and this brace makes my knee fill stable and secure
customer_reviews.author: Zachary McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: Great feel
customer_reviews.text: This do not restrict my movement. It not too tight around my knee. I do recommended you buy it . You will enjoy it
customer_reviews.author: catherine

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by my PT
customer_reviews.text: I can see why this brace was recommended by my PT. It is pretty comfortable and provides great support. It is a bit expensive, but hopefully it will be the only brace that I ever have to buy.
customer_reviews.author: M. Everhart

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Doc said i should get this and its a good kneew brace
customer_reviews.author: weiny

customer_reviews.title: My knee pain is gone and my pickleball game is on fire!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for right knee which has hurt for years after a basketball injury and surgery. It felt so much better that i bought a second one for my left knee. The sizing chart helps get a precise fit vs. the cheaper stuff with their limited size range. There are lots of cheap imitations here on Amazon, but my orthopaedic sports medicine doctor said get the Bauerfeind as they will last for years. They have really helped with my confidence on court as I was always playing tentatively due to pain and fear that I would further injure my knees. I am really glad I bought the Bauerfeinds.
customer_reviews.author: W. R. Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Great Support
customer_reviews.text: I have been experiencing a sharp pain on my right knee that had been bothering me for over a month. I tried this knee support and have been pleasantly surprised by the results... The pain has subsided, and I have more range of motion.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

product_meta.title: Bauerfeind - GenuTrain - Knee Support - Targeted Support for Pain Relief and Stabilization of the Knee, Provides Relief of Weak, Swollen, and Injured Knees
product_meta.description:
Bauerfeind’s GenuTrain knee braces and supports provide relief and stability for the knee joint. They relieve pain and protect the joint without limiting your mobility. 



 Protect Your Knees - Knees are among the most common area of the body to suffer pain and injury. If your knee feels weak, swollen or painful, the GenuTrain knee support can help you. 



 Active Knee Support - Whether you are a serious athlete, an active person who doesn’t want pain or injury to interfere with the things you love to do or a worker recovering from an injury, GenuTrain knee braces are for you. They help you regain mobility, ease pain, stimulate healing, and ensure that any swelling subsides quickly. 



 Be Comfortable…and Active - Our soft knit fabric makes the support stretchy and comfortable. Because it’s breathable, it keeps sweat away from your skin, unlike Neoprene and other inferior materials. Our braces are machine washable in the gentle cycle which helps maintain its elasticity and original fit. Don’t bend and cave to knee pain; overcome it, with a GenuTrain knee brace and support by Bauerfeind.
feature_bullets: CORRECT FIT AND SIZING: With your knee slightly bent, use the center/outside of your knee as your starting point and measure 5 1/2" up your thigh. Measure around thigh for circumference. Using center/outside of knee for starting point, measure 4 3/4" down your calf. Measure around calf for circumference. Make sure measure tape is not too tight or too loose. If your thigh measurements are split between two sizes, choose the Comfort (C) size. Refer to sizing chart & video for correct sizing.

PROTECT YOUR KNEES WITH THE BEST: Incorporated silicone Omega pad leaves the kneecap (patella) pressure free and provides intermittent compression to the soft tissue of the joint leading to increased circulation, thus aiding in the reabsorption of swelling and edema. Helps keep pressure off the knee cap.

BE COMFORTABLE & TAKE PRESSURE OFF THE KNEE: Our soft knit fabric makes the support stretchy and comfortable. It’s breathable, so it keeps sweat away from your skin, unlike Neoprene and other inferior materials. Our braces are machine washable (gentle cycle), which helps maintain its elasticity and original fit.

USED TO HELP TREAT & HELP PREVENT: Knee strains or sprains, Knee instability, Post-arthroscopy, Pre- and post-operative knee inflammation, Osgood-Schlatter's disease, Arthritis, Osteoarthritis, Degenerative joint disease (DJD), Adolescent knee pain, Recurrent knee pain.

THE BAUERFEIND STANDARD OF QUALITY: All Bauerfeind products are made in Germany with the highest manufacturing standards to ensure superior quality. Bauerfeind technology has evolved over the past 80+ years and continues to set the standard in fit, comfort, support and performance.
